Package org.coronabounce.models

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
org.coronabounce.models.Wall
public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
Stop CoquilleBille by making them bounce. It have a fix X position but can be moved in y.

    • willCrossWallInY

      public boolean willCrossWallInY​(CoquilleBille coc)
      Return true if it will cross the wall in y.
      It will hit in Y only if wall is enoth low.
      Parameters:
      coc - The CoquilleBille that we may make bounce.
